dict.string: This is your ranking in the PredictorPro world league. This is based simply on the points you have scored since the start of the season.
Your rating is calculated based on your performance and your general activity within the game.
This is the average points you score per prediction.
This is the number of goals scored in games that you correctly predicted the final score averaged over all your predictions for this season.
The total number of results you have correctly predicted this season
The total number of games for which you have predicted exactly the right score this season.
The total number of goals scored in games that you correctly predicted the final score this season
Cannot connect to the PredictorPro server. Check that you're connected to the internet & try again.
Shoot us an email iphone@predictorpro.com we'll see what we can do.
Your banter is too long (%i characters). The limit is 75!
Are you sure you want to send an invite to %@?
